TopicTitle: What mods have the best assortment of space station and planetary base habitats?

Articles.Content:
What mods have the best assortment of space station and planetary base habitats?

I'm looking for a diversity of things like living quarters, greenhouses, observation decks, inflatable structures, etc.

thanks

Well, Lack Luster Labs is a good place to start. It's got the most comprehensive collection of base and station parts, and they can be combined in infinite ways because they're very simple.

There's plenty of other stuff kicking around - this random greenhouse that I picked up somewhere is lagtastic, but awesome-looking. As for other stuff, you'll really just have to look around and see what you get.
How about the HOME pack? I don't use it but it seems pretty popular.
Well the FusTek station parts pack have a good assortment of Station parts, and I think later on he may expand into some base components as well.
I like FusTek, I'm planning to use them on my next station (as soon as I can design a lifter that'll get it into orbit!)

The HOME pack is pretty awesome. Sometimes it takes some creative thinking to land them the way you want, though, because all the modules are 3m parts. So i would recommend a rocket pack like KW Rocketry to go along with it so you have 3m rocket parts, as well.

So,

Lack Luster Labs

HOME with KW rocketry (apparently HOME is a bit buggy and not updated since May. It may even be incompatible now. (0.20))

FusTek station parts pack

Thanks

Edited July 28, 2013 by Gus
